archimate:Requirement.name: PA.1.1.14b: b) securely destroying all information stored on hardware (e.g. if being discarded, sold or returned to a leasing supplier) using techniques to make the information non-retrievable
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
